creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John M. and Janet B. McKelvey
description: High shouldered seed jar with light tan ground and designs painted in dark brown pigment; repeating blade like design (feather design) is painted top side of jar from rim to shoulder; wave like pattern is painted on top side of jar as well as othe geomtric designs; below the shoulder is a series geometric designs paint in dark brown pigment;
markings: Signed on bottom; S. Loretto; Jemez
title: Seed jar
